com.pvsagar.smartlockscreen.receivers

Class BluetoothReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      • com.pvsagar.smartlockscreen.receivers.BluetoothReceiver

  • public class BluetoothReceiver
extends android.content.BroadcastReceiver
    Created by aravind on 5/9/14. Receives an intent whenever a bluetooth device is connected/disconnected, and takes the required actions
